entities.name: harry

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather, who is upset about Snape stopping Harry's Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, who tries to calm down Sirius and advises Harry on how to handle the situation with Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The Potions master at Hogwarts, who has stopped giving Harry Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as someone who will be informed about Snape's actions.

entities.name: occlumency
entities.description: A subject taught by Snape to Harry, which involves controlling one's thoughts and emotions.

relationships.description: Sirius is angry with Snape for stopping Harry's Occlumency lessons.
Lupin tries to calm down Sirius, who is upset about Snape's actions.
Harry receives instructions from Lupin on how to handle the situation with Snape.
Dumbledore has authority over Snape and will be informed about his actions.
